definition[0]: a fly-by-night company or businessman is one that you cannot trust because they have only been in business for a short time and are only interested in making quick profits
definition[1]: a fly-by-night company or businessperson is not reliable and is only interested in making a quick profit and then disappearing
example[0]: The authority requires surety bonds of $50,000 from health agencies to deter fly-by-night operations from joining the program.
